contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = On The Way | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Jandek]] | Cover = Jandek0755.jpg | Released = 1988 | Recorded = Unknown | Genre = [[Blues-rock]] / [[Avant-garde]] / [[Folk music]] | Length = 43:45 | Label = [[Corwood Industries]] | Producer = Corwood Industries | Last album = ''[[You Walk Alone]]''<br/>(1988) | This album = ''''''''On the Way''''''''<br/>(1988) | Next album = ''[[The Living End (Jandek album)|The Living End]]''<br/>(1989) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = ''[[Forced Exposure]]'' #12 | rev1Score = (very favorable) [http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0755 link] | rev2 = ''LowLife'' #15 | rev2Score = [http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0755 link] | rev3 = ''Sound Choice'' #17 | rev3Score = [http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0755 link] | noprose = yes }} '''''On the Way''''' is the seventeenth album by [[Jandek]], released in 1988 as Corwood 0755. It was reissued on CD in 2002. ==Track listing== #Wrap It Up – 3:19 #Bring It Back to Seventy-Five – 2:34 #Message to the Clerk – 6:44 #Give It the Name – 5:38 #Ambient Instrument – 2:32 #Sadie – 2:36 #I'll Sit Alone and Think a Lot About You – 8:36 #The Only Way You Can Go – 5:33 #I'm Ready – 5:47 == External links == *[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0755 Seth Tisue's ''On the Way'' review] [[Category:Jandek albums]] [[Category:Corwood Industries albums]] [[Category:1988 albums]]
